Enslaved as a gladiator by his summoner, Head Priestess Zayd, Mikagami is forced to fight in the horrible Battle Coliseum. Losing means getting raped. In this moment, as despair turns to hope, this is Mikagami's chance to grow!!","es":"Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. Sin embargo, cuando se trata de videojuegos, resulta que es un gamer compulsivo.\nFue invocado a otro mundo y la habilidad que obtuvo fue \"Copiar\", que en ese mundo es una habilidad inútil.\nDebido a eso, es esclavizado como gladiador por su invocadora la tetona Sacerdotisa Zayd, donde se dice que será violado si pierde, Mikagami es atormentado por el miedo y la desesperación, pero en el proceso, se da cuenta de algo que hace su desesperación se convierte en esperanza, y el Coliseo se convierta en el único escenario de Mikagami.","es-la":"Koji Mikagami, es un estudiante mediocre y su forma física es regular. In her vids, she shares her love of poetry yet never her own face, because — let’s be honest — people are the worst, especially on the internet. Her cherished anonymity is broken when her classmate Aster discovers her private life and wants to get closer to her. Will she keep her distance from him? Or will she let down the walls she built to protect her heart from life’s cruel realities?\n\n---\n- [Official English Translation \u003cTapas\u003e](https://tapas.io/series/the-poem-of-aster-and-hana/info)\n---\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cNaver\u003e](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6300633)\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003ckakao\u003e](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57321523)\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cBomtoon\u003e](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/sparrow/)","ko":"구독자 10만 시 낭독 방송으로 초 인기 스트리머인 김참새의 정체는 친구도 없이 시집만 읽고 사는 여중생 김하나?! \n그런데 그 많은 구독자 중 한 명이 하필 같은 반에 있을 줄이야...! \n국어 시간에 지문을 읽는 김하나의 목소리를 듣고 김하나=김참새임을 눈치챈 이한별은 김하나에게 호감을 품고, \n결국 사귀고 싶어 안달이 나버리는데!\n\n---\n- [Official English Translation \u003cTapas\u003e](https://tapas.io/series/the-poem-of-aster-and-hana/info)\n---\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cNaver\u003e](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6300633)\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003ckakao\u003e](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=57321523)\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cBomtoon\u003e](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/sparrow/)"},"links":{"al":"129701","ap":"the-poem-of-aster-and-hana","kt":"65206","mal":"154503","mu":"15i74ch","raw":"https://www.lezhin.com/en/comic/poemasterhana"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

У світі самураїв Афро вважається, що той, хто стане \"Номер Один\", правитиме світом, володіючи силою, подібною до божественної. \n\n\nХтось стає Першим, вбиваючи попереднього Першого і забираючи його церемоніальну пов'язку на голові. Однак єдине правило в цьому світі полягає в тому, що тільки \"Номер Два\" (також позначений священною пов'язкою на голові) може битися з \"Номер Один\". Зворотний бік цього правила полягає в тому, що будь-хто (і, як правило, кожен) може кинути виклик і спробувати вбити \"Номер Два\", щоб отримати право рухатися далі і кинути виклик \"Номеру Один\". Коли бандит кинув виклик його батькові, Афро був ще дитиною. Нападник відтяв батькові голову прямо на очах у юного Афро. \n\n\nТепер дорослий, Афро Самурай - нинішній Номер Два і майстерний фехтувальник; він мандрує дорогою, прагнучи помститися Справедливості, нинішньому Номеру Один. The people of Terca Lumireis enjoy their lives, living in cities shielded by barriers that keep them safe from the monsters of their world.  \n  \nThe Empire once reigned over the people as a bedrock of peace. Blastia, the legacy of an ancient civilization, was under the strict control of the Empire and only certain people became privileged to their use. The poor of the world soon formed organizations in search of freedom-the guilds-and strived to live outside the Empire's rule. Eventually, through conflict and compromise, a new society formed with a complicated relationship between the Empire and the guilds.  \n  \nEven after the Great War ten years ago and disputed rights of succession after the demise of the Emperor, this world seemed peaceful…  \n  \nAND NOW…  \n  \nYuri was raised in the lower quarter of Zaphias. He joined the Imperial Knights with Flynn-Yuri's childhood best friend-but quit because he was disappointed by the Imperial Knights' corruption. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.","es-la":"Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.","pt-br":"A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.\r\n\r\nContudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.\r\n\r\nMas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.","vi":"Hunter là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy, từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến những cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. In order to avoid the future where she dies a horrible death, Elisha decides to become the possession of a maniac. She offered up her body as guarantee and became a contracted fiancée of his. Where will this contract lead to...?!\n\n---\nOrphaned and living in a monastery, Elisha de Lauer was content and happy. That was until the De Cartiers, known for having magical abilities, came to find her. This snake-filled family forces Elisha into a slave contract with their eyes on inheriting her many assets. After years of servitude to the De Cartiers, Elisha meets a gruesome end at the hands of her captors. That would’ve been the end of her tale, but as she closed her eyes to die, she awoke again in her own past as if nothing had ever happened. With this second chance, she vows revenge on the De Cartiers and finds the perfect accomplice in rumored maniac, Lucerne des Kayas. Lucerne, an outcast member of the De Cartier family, has also sworn revenge on them. But, his unwavering distrust of everyone stirs him to form a contract with Elisha only under one condition. She must agree to marry him. Flung into a fake marriage, these two align to uncover the secrets of the De Cartiers and bring each member down. There’s just one secret they each can’t seem to figure out. Why does it seem like they have met before?\n\n---\n[Original Novel (R19)](https://ridibooks.com/books/2259003291)\n[Original Webtoon (R15)](https://ridibooks.com/books/1746014731)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-predators-fiancee)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc31890)\n* [French / Français](https://www.tappytoon.com/fr/book/he-predators-fiancee-fr)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/book/the-predators-fiancee-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/the-predators-fiancee/list?title_no=4828)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/102033)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/the-predators-fiancee/list?title_no=4199)","fr":"Orpheline vivant dans un monastère, Elisha de Lauer était satisfaite et heureuse. Cette famille sournoise imposa alors à Elisha un contrat d’esclavage dans l’espoir d’hériter de ses nombreux biens. dd60bcb4-7b56-4e99-b776-be85cfd6f7d0:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"dd60bcb4-7b56-4e99-b776-be85cfd6f7d0","title":{"ja-ro":"Sabu to Ichi Torimonohikae"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Sabu to Ichi Torimono Hikae"},{"ja":"佐武と市捕物控"},{"en":"Sabu and Ichi's Detective Stories"},{"ja-ro":"Sabu to Ichi Torimonohikae"},{"en":"Sabu \u0026 Ichi's Arrest Warrant"},{"fr":"Sabu et Ichi (Kana)"}],"lastChapter":"83","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"The series follows the adventures of Sabu, a young Edo bakufu investigator, aided by the blind master swordsman Ichi. They deal with a wild variety of macabre mysteries and sordid crimes. Sabu is engaged to Midori, the daughter of his boss, who works as a police officer for the Tokugawa shogunate. The situations they deal with often shine a mournful and cynical light on the human condition, but the staunch friendship between Sabu and Ichi helps them cope. The manga gives a strong portrait of life in Tokugawa Edo, enhanced by the artwork which draws on Japanese traditional art.  \n\n**Note**: From 1966-1967, the manga was serialized in Weekly Shonen Sunday. From 1968-1972, the serialization was moved to Big Comic, causing a shift in demographic. Periodic one-shots with the two leads were still published after in different magazines.\n\n--- \n- **Won the 13th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1967**"},"links":{"al":"42427","ap":"sabu-to-ichi-torimonohikae","kt":"22770","mal":"12427","mu":"iduitzg"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"df33b754-73a3-4c54-80e6-1a74a8058539","name":{"en":"Police"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}
